channel.title: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer
channel.description: I was wondering how i would go about making custom sounds, maps, monsters and weapons for a 498, I've been having idea's about adding custom things to a rs remake to make up for missing content. i would like to add several new area's, Weapons, sounds, gfx etc etc.... someone please help :o I would be incredibly grateful.

item.title: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer
item.dc:creator: @icexpanda icexpanda
item.source: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer

item.title: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer
item.dc:creator: @arean1 arean1
item.description:
@arean1 wrote:

Custom items and NPCs are client sided and can easily be found through the models section. If you mean you personally want to create these customs you would need to learn how to model.

Creating quests is server sided, there are many tutorials on how to make custom quests.

You can choose your client to load higher revision maps if you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer

item.title: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer
item.dc:creator: @icexpanda icexpanda
item.description:
@icexpanda wrote:

vain_ please take it easy on me :o, im new and yes i want to create/add custom weapons and make custom sound fx/ maps, quests, monsters and add them in after im done perfecting the skills. Please keep in mind this is a personal project i want to learn off of but id like to know how to add/create custom weapons/soundfx, maps, quests and monsters. Thank you for your help in advance :o

Read full topic
item.source: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer

item.title: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

first off dont call yourself a programmer of any tier.

secondly theres only one true 498 out, and im pretty sure it already has support for what you asked. so just read through the code.

unless you mean to physically create the animations and graphic splashes/midi sounds?

Read full topic
item.source: Standard everyday issues of a rsps programmer
